attributes.action: ISPs must send reports of any visits to adult sites to the owner of WiFi router.
attributes.additional_details:
(Monthly reports)
Primarily, this law would have the specific aim of reducing the number of teenagers who visit pornographic sites. However, this law would be beneficial for those in a relationship... a partner will not be able to secretly watch pornography so easily. 
VPNs are a loophole, but the goal of substantially reducing the number of pornography-viewers should still be achieved because some may be discouraged.
attributes.background:
ISP = Internet Service Provider
e.g. BT, Sky Broadband, Virgin Media etc.
